columns.name: task_definition_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the task definition.

columns.name: cpu
columns.description: The number of cpu units used by the task.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the task definition.

columns.name: execution_role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task execution role that grants the Amazon ECS container agent permission to make AWS API calls on your behalf.

columns.name: family
columns.description: The name of a family that this task definition is registered to.

columns.name: ipc_mode
columns.description: The IPC resource namespace to use for the containers in the task.

columns.name: memory
columns.description: The amount (in MiB) of memory used by the task.

columns.name: network_mode
columns.description: The Docker networking mode to use for the containers in the task.

columns.name: pid_mode
columns.description: The process namespace to use for the containers in the task.

columns.name: revision
columns.description: The revision of the task in a particular family.

columns.name: task_role_arn
columns.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that grants containers in the task permission to call AWS APIs on your behalf.

columns.name: registered_at
columns.description: The Unix timestamp for when the task definition was registered.

columns.name: registered_by
columns.description: The principal that registered the task definition.

columns.name: container_definitions
columns.description: A list of container definitions in JSON format that describe the different containers that make up your task.

columns.name: compatibilities
columns.description: The launch type to use with your task.

columns.name: inference_accelerators
columns.description: The Elastic Inference accelerator associated with the task.

columns.name: placement_constraints
columns.description: An array of placement constraint objects to use for tasks.

columns.name: proxy_configuration
columns.description: The configuration details for the App Mesh proxy.

columns.name: requires_attributes
columns.description: The container instance attributes required by your task.

columns.name: requires_compatibilities
columns.description: The launch type the task requires. If no value is specified, it will default to EC2. Valid values include EC2 and FARGATE.

columns.name: volumes
columns.description: The list of volume definitions for the task.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with task.
